I've always enjoyed Reading Rainbow, but it hasn't appealed to my kids. I'm glad LeVar won an Emmy for it!

Mary Ellen
----- Original Message ----- LeVar Burton won
and emmy for the best children's series Reading
Rainbow.

He said that this may be the last year of the show due
to lack of funds.

messages.subject: Reading Rainbow
messages.msgSnippet: Sitting here flipping through the TV I caught the Emmy Awards on.  It just so happened that LeVar Burton won and emmy for the best children s series Reading
messages.messageBody:
Sitting here flipping through the TV I caught the Emmy
Awards on. It just so happened that LeVar Burton won
and emmy for the best children's series Reading
Rainbow.

He said that this may be the last year of the show due
to lack of funds.

I feel this is something that can't happen. I have a
hard time with this happening when there is so much
stuff on there that is not good.

Thank you for letting me sound off.

Leslie
